dmca.title: Perfect 10 complaint to Amazon, forwarded to Google
dmca.body:
December 23, 2005

VIA FAX (310) 205-9644 AND REGULAR MAIL

Norm Zada, PhD.
Perfect 10, Inc.
P.O. Box 3398
Beverly Hills, CA 90212

Dear Dr. Zada:

This letter is in response to your most recent fax dated November 21, 2005 concerning the images of Perfect 10 models. Please know that Amazon respects the intellectual property rights of others. However, the web search capability offered through the Amazon.com site is powered by Google, and we do not exercise control over individual images, words, or links that are shown as part of searches.

To address your concerns, we have discussed the matter with Google and forwarded your correspondence to them for appropriate handling. We trust you will find this approach reasonable.

If you would like to discuss the matter further, please feel free to contact me. I will be out of the office next week and will return on January 3, 2006.
Sincerely,
[signed]
Karen Akiyama Ressmeyer Corporate Counsel

cc: Kathy Sheehan

[attached notice to Amazon]
The following is a DMCA notice.

We have discovered a massive misappropriation of Perfect 10 images that appear from Amazon (A9) web search and image search. This situation is very serious as consumers can view essentially the entirety of the Perfect 10 library over and over without paying anything by utilizing Amazon search. Consumers can also see thousands of high quality third party copyrighted images without charge, which makes the situation even more damaging for our company.

Web sites whose images your company routinely displays that admit that they do not own the rights to their content and typically have misappropriated Perfect 10 images or rights of publicity - if they have not they could at any time - include lbritneyspears.com, 1000celebrities_corm, 1024x768wallpapers.com, 3thehardway.nl, aahceleb.com, aboutcelebs.com, absolutepictures.com, actressarchives.com, actressgallery.corn, allcelebrities.corn, aessecelebs.com, alwaysgirls_com, anywallpapers.com, artimages.hpg.1g.eom.br, babedump.com, babefocus.corn, babeszonewalls_corn, bashfulmonkey.com, belloscans.hpg.ig.com.br, bestcelebritygallery, coin,

dreamgirltop 100. corn, drunkcelebs.co.uk, eforu.com, erosdc.it,erosimages.hpg.ig.cons. br, eroticland,net, famousbabes.com, famousbody.corm, famouswomen.com, fastcelebs.com., finnbabes.com, fmkcelebs.com, freecelebnudes.corn, free-nude-celebrities,dk, freedailygallery_com, girlfinder.dk, hollywoodmasti.corn, home.t-online.de, hotcelebs.ca, hotrnodeldirectoay.com, hunkydestop.co.uk, gwool.com, hollywood4u.com, hqstars.corn, inca69,corn, klatu.hpg.ig.com.br, kournikova pictures.corn, model-cafe.conn., rroono.corn, movietop100.com, rnugshots.net, nakedcelebworld.corn, nakedstars.com, nakiecelebs.com, nude-celebs-a-z.com, nudecelebsmagazine_com, pcelebs.com, nocerainf.it, palantirbr_hpg.ig.com.br, paparazzipom_com, photonetion2_hpg.ig.com.br, pictureview.com, perfectpeople.net, popcelebs.corn, privateholes.corin., pumlicz.ufouni.cz, raptor6.hpg.ig.corn_br, safecelebs.com, sexydesktop.co,uk, screensavershot.com, sliceofthedaycelebs.corn, supermodelforever_com, superbcelebrities_com, mensplayground.com, lavender.fortunecity.com, heavenlycelebrities.corr>, nudebabepage.thefaktory.net, robbscelebs.co.uk, btinternet.com, photoscelebrities.com. pix..alronix.net, platinum-celebs.corn, realb eauties. net, Rebecca-gayheart. corn, redlemonfakes.corn, redrob2.co_uk, scanorphane.allsexpages, corn, scanorphane.alladultfemale.corn, scoopy.net, scottss_com, sfondideldesktop.com,
 
shippys-world_corn, sonofamosa.cora, spicegirls.co.uk, superiorpics.com, supermodels.it, supermodelwi.zard.corn, superpinup _ corn, top 10-screensavers_com, xaviersite.corn, tuckbros.free.fr, masterscans.hpg.ig_com_br, theseeretcollectionl.hpg.ig.com_br, thurnbs.globalnews.it, trexscans.hpg_ig.com.br, undergrounds.com., nudecelebritypics.corn, nudecelebsmagazine.corn, safecelebs_coni, wwwdaredevilmovie_cor, wwwnation.com, wwwterminator.eom, womendex.com, jerkengine.com, celebrityheights.com, ottoperuna.altervista.org, dainews.nu, wickedb ab ez. corn, celebshop .con), celebsxposed.com, thecelebrityportal.corn, xcinemax.cam, xxxcelebsex.coin, wallpapery.net, whoscan.com, wozidercelebs.com, worldclasscelebs,com, wwwterminator_corx, zuccaweb.it, and movieman.corn. Jerkengine.com has thousands of Perfect 10 infringements and dainews.nu has many as well. Amazon should not be displaying images from or linking to any website that
admits that it has stolen its content particularly after receiving a D114CA notice about such a website. if you want to find websites that admit they do not own their content, do a search on "public domain" & copyright & and either celebs or various celebrity names like "Britney Spears." Such standard disclaimers include language like "All pictures, photos, and posters are copyrighted by their respective owners," - from altocelebs.corn; "All pictures are assumed to be in the public domain," from free.bol.bg; "The pictures, graphics, and some of the information at this site are either from other internet sources or originally scanned by HollywoodMasti.com from popular magazines or posters. The copyright on these images belongs to the original photographer or the publisher of them;" or "All photographs of models and celebrities posted in this web site is the property of their respective owners," from Gwool.coxn; or "Jerkengine.com contains photographic images that have been collected from various public domain internet resources_ Copyright ownership is not claimed, implied, nor guaranteed and remains that of the author(s)."

Amazon is also listing password hacking websites in its search results which contain perfect 10 passwords and passwords for other websites in which Perfect 10 owns copyrighted images. Because the passwords on theses sites come and go, any password hacking website could be dispensing perfect10.com passwords at any time. Sites that have distributed perfectlO.com and perfectten.com passwords in the past include abupasswords.com, accessions.org, adult-hacks.corn, adult-password.com, adultpasswordcracks.corn, adultundergrounnd.corn, allpasswords.com, altpassword.com, backdoors.org, banditpasswords_com, bestxxxpasswords_com, cleanpasses.org, custom--hacks. com, darkflash. corn, dirty-passwords. corn, dutchpasswords. coin, eastpasswords.com, extremepasses.cor, exxxpasswords_com, ezypass.com, fantasypass.corn, forbiddenpasswords.com, forbidden xx.net, forbiddenxxx_org, forodivx.com, fredspasses_com, freepasses.net, freesexwebsites.com, freeweb.hu, freshhacks.com, grudgefuck.com, hackedlogins_com, hackedpass.com, hackedpaysites.com, haclotxxpasses.com, iseekpasswords.cor, killysex.com, loginaccepted.coin, lostcoders.net, luckysxx passwords.com, mad-passes_com, mostpasswords.com, mperfect.net, necrohiphop.com, nejcpass.cora, passwordexpress.com, pass4u.net, passcracker.corn, passdb.com, passes4ali,com, passwordcorp.corn, passwordhq.com, peterspasses.dk, sweetpasswords.corn, xxxpassrnasters,com, xxxpasswordrus.com, yourxxxpasses.corn, zimapass.com, gold 
 
members. com, crazypasses.com, passwordoutlet_corn, happy-haeker_coni, rawpasswords-corn, tany'asrnegasite.com, nudepass_com, passwordforum.com, ultrapasswords.com, onlinexpassi.uords_com, uhfpasswords.com, and most other password hacking websites.

Perfect 10's copyrighted works which have been infringed can be found at perfect) O. com. If you wish to examine such copyrighted works, we can provide you with a temporary username/password with which you may do so. Simply click on the first letter of the first name of the model. For example, if you wanted to find the Perfect 10 copyrighted images of Alena Drazna, the first model listed in the attached spreadsheet, you would click on "A," and then look for her name.

In the attached Excel spreadsheet, most of the 1`TRLs in the first column identify the web page containing the infringing image. In a few cases, the site is a subscription site that sells thousands of Perfect 10 images without authorization. Examples of those sites in this spreadsheet are alibis.com, athenanews.com, galacticgroups,com, newsdemon.com, thundernews.corn, rnewsgroup-binaries.com, usenext.com, powerusenet.com, rhinonewsgroups_com, usenetgiant.corn, usenetmonster.com, usenet-unlimited.com, and xusenet.con. For those websites, you need to join and then in most cases search using the model name in the second column I have removed the starting "http://www." on the URLs below to reduce their size. The second column represents the Amazon search term that was used to find that infringing URL. The third column gives the location of the Perfect 10 copyrighted images being infringed, namely, perfect10.com,

I have a good faith belief that the use of the Perfect 10 copyrighted material in the manner complained of in this email is not authorized by the copyright holder Perfect 10, it's agent, or the law. The information in this notification is accurate. I swear under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of Perfect 10, Inc. the owner of the exclusive rights in the material which is being infringed.

/Norm Zada, Ph.D./

Norm, Zada, Ph,D. Perfect 10, Inc.
800-606-6639 
P.O. Box 3398
Beverly Hills, CA 90212 nonmanz@earthlink.net
